episode_event_pasiosalon_date_ch0133_00_: Ah, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. You came.

I called you here because I wanted to ask
you something.

Ethan and the others are always going on about
“friends,” and I wanted to hear what you thought
about that.

I’m not talking about the definition of the word.
Of course I know that.

But if a friend is just someone you can laugh and
joke around with, that’s such a weak connection
that I don’t see the point.

I mean, it’s fine to spend time with someone if
you’re competing and getting stronger together...

But what’s the point of acting all buddy-buddy,
like Ethan and the others?

After all, the point of competing is to beat the
other person, right?
I’ve got no use for any sickly sweet feelings.

But everyone else seems so happy with the idea of
being “friends,” like they want us all to run around
holding hands or something.
If you expect me to do that...forget it.
That’s not what friendship means.
Hm? What do you mean?

So you’re saying a friend is someone you can...
be yourself around?
You’re wrong, Silver.

You’re saying a friend is someone who...lets me
be myself?
Or at least that’s what you think.

Well, as long as I don’t have to change myself to
please other people, I guess it’s fine.
And if they still call me a friend despite that...

Hmph... This whole conversation isn’t like me
at all.

I could do with a change of mood. Have a battle
with me!

I’m sure that’s what you were expecting from me
in the first place, anyway.
Oh... [Name:PlayerNickname ].
I just got finished with a team battle...

But this time, I didn’t feel as much like the others
were holding me back.

Just thinking about what you told me—that I can
be myself—must have taken some of the
pressure off.

Were you able to trust
your teammates?

Hmm... Well, at the very least, we managed not to
annoy each other.
But you still don’t like team battles?
Hmm... Well, at least I didn’t hate it this time.

As long as I’m here on Pasio, I can’t exactly avoid
team battles.

And I can’t just go on allowing it to be a
weakness of mine.
I guess I should thank you. So...thanks.

You’re willing to help anyone out, even someone
like me.

You and Ethan and others who make friends easily
are all really strong as well...
and I think I’m beginning to understand why.

I bet if I keep spending time with you all, I can
become a lot stronger myself.
That’s what it means to be friends.
Being able to be myself with you... Huh.
So, are you saying you’re my friend, too?
You mean as friends?
Hmph... Who’s to say?

Think whatever you like. Just as I’ll think whatever
I like about you.

Just so you know, I don’t plan on staying on the
same level as you forever.
Try not to fall too far behind.
